Articles.Content:
Here it is. put inside GameData/Hyomoto/Internal Patches

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wio3jvaqemyc5kx/SH_KN2CabinInternal-RPM.cfg

Oh -- interesting. That folder doesn't exist for me. I seem to recall it before, though. Dropping this file into the GameData/Hyomoto/Patches folder results in the left and right MFD working, but the larger center panel is missing outright.

Maybe I'll try re-creating /Internal Patches ? I can't imagine that will work if the Hyomoto mod isn't looking for that folder.

Oh -- interesting. That folder doesn't exist for me. I seem to recall it before, though. Dropping this file into the GameData/Hyomoto/Patches folder results in the left and right MFD working, but the larger center panel is missing outright.

Maybe I'll try re-creating /Internal Patches ? I can't imagine that will work if the Hyomoto mod isn't looking for that folder.

I think RPM .17 and later have a thing that can automatically update 1 MFD to work, but not more than one.

Oh -- interesting. That folder doesn't exist for me. I seem to recall it before, though. Dropping this file into the GameData/Hyomoto/Patches folder results in the left and right MFD working, but the larger center panel is missing outright.

Maybe I'll try re-creating /Internal Patches ? I can't imagine that will work if the Hyomoto mod isn't looking for that folder.

You might have the RPM patch for Kerbonov that maintains the stock navball... I recall there were two of them, on with that and one without. Will search a bit.

Edit: Here without nvball: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66502-Kerbonov-Kn-2-Cockpit-Module?p=916510&viewfull=1#post916510

and here with navball: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66502-Kerbonov-Kn-2-Cockpit-Module?p=916636&viewfull=1#post916636

The original patches are there. The cfg I made with the changes suggested by mike9606 is applicable only to one of the two (obviously the one I'm using, which I can't recall what is, sry ). Just a matter of substituting the other archive with the right one, since the folder just bares two cfg files.

Edited July 27, 2014 by BadLeo
Thanks for the 1.25M inline passenger compartment! I had requested something like that, and there it is!
Minor update: 0.24 is out and money exists now, so I went back and tweaked prices on everything to bring it a bit more in line with the stock parts. Aside from prices nothing has been changed.

Minor update: 0.24 is out and money exists now, so I went back and tweaked prices on everything to bring it a bit more in line with the stock parts. Aside from prices nothing has been changed.

Thanks man!
This is the best interior design ever :-]
Looks great the better iva things is the best part.
Awesome awesome parts. May I post action screenshots here? Or elsewhere?

If I can make a suggestion, could you please start using a version number system.

It makes it easier to keep track of updates.
The cockpit not only works great as an aircraft cockpit but also on an asteroid tug or other spacecraft of similar use. I LOVE that cockpit.

One of my favourite mods.

Not a huge fan of the Hood ornament or the Grid Fin though.

Have you considered using the new clear pod software for the cockpit so we can see the pilots while we fly? Maybe do it as a 2nd part though for those who are worried about performance.

Just curious.
The fuel tank could be perhaps bigger
Are these TweakScalable, especially the grid fins?

Are these TweakScalable, especially the grid fins?

Not out of the box. It's pretty easy to add TS to the grid fin. Just put this in a MM cfg file:



@PART[Gridfin] 
{
	MODULE
	{
		name = TweakScale
		type = surface
	}
}
Is an update needed for these parts to work with 0.25?

Is an update needed for these parts to work with 0.25?

No, but you will have to edit the RPM config Hyomoto made for it to work with the new RPM version. Otherwise this should work fine.

No, but you will have to edit the RPM config Hyomoto made for it to work with the new RPM version. Otherwise this should work fine.

Yea, Im only seeing one of the panels. Do you happen to have the config written up?

Yea, Im only seeing one of the panels. Do you happen to have the config written up?

Just use Notepad's replace function to replace RasterPropMonitorExampleMFD with RasterPropMonitorBasicMFD
any chance of haveing the gridfins far compatible.

That did the trick for the MFDs thanks. But now the external part texture is gone. Its just white.

EDIT: Nevermind. X64 linux does weird stuff sometimes. WE ALL GOOD.

Edited November 2, 2014 by UAL002

That did the trick for the MFDs thanks. But now the external part texture is gone. Its just white.

its not just you, I've been having that problem to on a lot of outdated part mods.

I made a config that changes this cockpits prop layout.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99252-0-25-AIPS-Better-IVA-Prop-Placement-v1-%28Pre-release-%29

Since there were no issues with this from 0.24 to 0.25, can we assume these parts will still work in 0.90 as well?

I guess I'll just have to try them and find out.
